carpooling_package

Class Car

  • java.lang.Object
    • carpooling_package.Car

  • public class Car
extends java.lang.Object
    This class have all the information of each car and apply some functions needed for reach car, like getting different information of a specific car.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Car(int id)
      This constructor takes only the car id, if it will just register
      Car(int carID, int tripsPerDay, Route route, int capacity, java.lang.String driverName)
      This constructor have all the needed information about a car to start making trips

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decCapacity()
      A function to decrease the capacity of the car when someone successfully reserve a trip on it
      int getCapcaity()
      A function that returns the total left seat in a car
      int getCarID()
      A function that returns the car ID
      java.lang.String getDreiverName()
      A function returns the driver name of the car
      java.lang.String getEndPoint()
      A function that returns the end point of the route the car will have its trip on
      java.lang.String getStartPoint()
      A function that returns the starting point of the route the car will have its trip on
      static int getTotalNumberOfCars()
      A static function to return the total number of car objects

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
